name: Quarter Life Crisis #LD44
description:
Jump  - Space or W

Left - A or Left arrow

Right - D or Right Arrow

A quarter starts it’s adventure into an arcade cabinet. It knows it needs to join it’s friends in the collection bin but does not know how difficult the journey will be and does not want to find out what happens to quarters that don’t make it there.

Final level will bring you back to the menu. Sorry dads
